title: Bridging the gap
brief_description: Designed to help acquire and realise the vital skills of parent-child communications. Dr Thomas Gordon, a nationally recognised authority, discusses such needs as identity, honest recognition of feelings, and courageous action as new methods of communicating, in an attempt to establish a deeper, and more intimate, relationship between parent and child.
